liquibase.change.AddForeignKeyConstraintChange

liquibase.change.AddForeignKeyConstraintChange Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for liquibase.change.AddForeignKeyConstraintChange:
[legend]

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Adds a foreign key constraint to an existing column.

Definition at line 24 of file AddForeignKeyConstraintChange.java.
